      • onResize

        public void onResize(Dimension oldSize,

        Description copied from interface: Renderable
        Called when the Graphics context invoking the Renderable has been resized, allowing the Renderable object to perform necessary scaling.
        Specified by:
        onResize in interface Renderable
        Parameters:
        oldSize - the original size of the context (may be null if not yet available).
        newSize - the new size of the grahpics context. This should never be null.
